parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The username and email of the user. Must be unique.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password of the user. Not encrypted.

response.name: userId
response.description: The user id of the attempting login user.

response.name: token
response.description: A random GUID dynamically generated by the server.

response.name: status
response.description: The status of the user. A is active; N is inactive.

response.name: role
response.description: The role of the user. U is user; A is admin.
